participant_1.background:
I keep my surroundings clean and read to keep my mind sharp.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
I'm going to re-read Anne of Green Gables, but I won't be sharing it with my mom.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Hi! It is going well. I just got back from a long day of work. What about you?
Not too bad. I just read a really good book and I am about to go for a walk.
Oh what book did you read?
I read Anne of Green Gables. It is a classic novel about a girl who is adopted by an old farmer and his wife.
Oh I love that book! It is so cute. I love how she is always getting into trouble.
Me too. I love her imagination.
What is your favorite thing about the book?
I think my favorite thing is the way she is always so optimistic and kind. She is always seeing the best in people.
That is a great quality to have. I wish I was more like that.
Me too. I think it would make life a lot easier.
What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I teach kindergarten.
Oh that must be fun. I could never teach kids. I am not good at explaining things.
It is a lot of fun. I love working with kids.
I am glad you like it.
